sys_script_include.name: AutoPopulate_UserDetails

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_313f926e935f261005b6367efaba10b6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1808462_mysdesk.AutoPopulate_UserDetails</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>true</mobile_callable><name>AutoPopulate_UserDetails</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var AutoPopulate_UserDetails = Class.create();
AutoPopulate_UserDetails.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getUserDetail:function() {

		var sysInfo = this.getParameter('sysparm_value'); //will return sys_id

		gs.log("sys_id: " + sysInfo)

		var x = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		x.addQuery('sys_id', sysInfo);
		x.query();
		if (x.next()){
			gs.log("User details: " + x.email + ',' + x.location + ',' + x.mobile_phone + ',' + x.manager);
			return x.email + ',' + x.location + ',' + x.mobile_phone + ',' + x.manager;
		}

     
    }

	// type: 'AutoPopulate_UserDetails'

});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-14 16:43:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>313f926e935f261005b6367efaba10b6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AutoPopulate_UserDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MyServiceDesk" source="x_1808462_mysdesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="MyServiceDesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_313f926e935f261005b6367efaba10b6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-15 13:04:29</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
